property.name: ASSHOT
property.shortdesc: Use the settings of the camera as shot.

property.name: AUTO
property.shortdesc: Automatically use the white balance settings.

property.name: DAYLIGHT
property.shortdesc: Use the settings as shot in daylight.

property.name: CLOUDY
property.shortdesc: Use the settings as shot on a cloudy day.

property.name: SHADE
property.shortdesc: Use the settings as shot in the shade.

property.name: TUNGSTEN
property.shortdesc: Use the settings as shot with tungsten lighting.

property.name: FLUORESCENT
property.shortdesc: Use the settings as shot with fluorescent lighting.

property.name: FLASH
property.shortdesc: Use the settings as shot with a flash.

property.name: CUSTOM
property.shortdesc: Use the custom settings for the shot parameters.
